attributes.action: Change in law for Black Mold health effects and landlords responsibilities towards Black Mold need to be toughened.
attributes.additional_details:
Change in law for Black Mold health effects and landlords responsibilities towards Black Mold need to be toughened.
Black Mold effects can be fatal and their is a lot of grey areas within the law please help shut down the loop holes and get landlords to take more responsibility for repairs and compensation.
